storyInfo: After being rescued by Rhodes Island, Lada returns to her home and inadvertently receives a gift from her parents working far away. As a result, Lada finds her determination to become an operator.

attributes.content: Hair ties, a water cup, and a throw pillow...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Gotta bring all of these with me!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: And this book too. Anna's gonna be so happy! And this music player... Sonya can listen to her songs!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Hm? What's this photo...?
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: It's... from the day I graduated elementary school. Mama and Papa came home early so the three of us could have this picture taken.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Papa, Mama...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Lada, are you ready yet?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Sorry, I'd like to let you stay a little longer, but we can't be in Ursus too long. Things will get pretty ugly if we're found out.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The transport team didn't give us much time, so we've got to hurry.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, I'll be out in a sec!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Packing up took a little longer than expected. This place has gotten a little messy, and there's a lot of stuff I can't find.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Damn them, those Reunion bastards... Look what they did when the city fell into chaos.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: So, Lada, what are you planning to do next? Is there some other place you'd like to go?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Um... I think I'm pretty much good!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: After Granny passed away, I was living alone anyway, so it's fine. Just gotta pack up my stuff and go!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: I see... It must've been hard living by yourself at your age.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Ehehe, it's not that bad. I've already gotten used to it.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Granny taught me how to cook, and I cooked for her for years!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: That's impressive. Compass's bunch once mentioned that a little girl who knew how to cook local specialties from our hometown had shown up, but didn't have a chance to try her cooking...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: But, be honest with me, Lada. Are you sure you want to come with us?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What's the matter? Why are you asking me such a serious question all of a sudden...?
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Well, I've already made up my mind! I want to be with Sonya and the others!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Haha, I'm glad all of you still get along so well.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Though... that's not what I was trying to ask.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Look, even though the outside plates are being accommodated by other cities and the people can only stay in the asylum shelters for the time being, things are gradually returning to normal.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Sooner or later, Chernobog's going to get rebuilt too. In a little while, returning to live here might be a viable option.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Hrmm....
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: To be honest... I'm not totally sure. Right now, I want to be with my friends, but as for what comes after that...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Mister Pointedneedle, if my friends decided to leave, I'm sure they already decided what they want to do. Both Anna and Sonya...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: But me...? Where can I go next?
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Sorry, I can't answer that for you. That's something for you to think about.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Lada, your situation isn't like that of Anna and the other girls. Even though you said you don't know exactly where your parents work, and there's no information about them in the registry...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'm sure Rhodes Island would be able to help you if you put in a request...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: In any case, I don't think you need to rush yourself to a decision.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...I didn't rush this decision at all!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I know you're just trying to look out for me, but...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Right now, I want to be together with my girls. As long as we're together, there's no place we can't go!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: As for what comes after that... I'm not too sure. I haven't really thought about it.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Lada...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: But, your parents...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Papa and Mama... They're always working somewhere else. They rarely came home anyway, and they never told me where they work. They rarely even wrote to me.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Even if those bad people didn't attack the city, I already hadn't seen Papa and Mama for a long time before that.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Lada, Papa and Mama are heading out for work.
attributes.name: Warm Woman

attributes.content: Lada, you listen to Granny now. Be a good girl and wait for us to come home, okay?
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: Papa, Mama, are you abandoning me again?
attributes.name: Tender Girl

attributes.content: *Sniffles*...
attributes.name: Tender Girl

attributes.content: Papa, Mama, don't go... I don't want to be an orphan... Waah...
attributes.name: Tender Girl

attributes.content: Lada...
attributes.name: Warm Woman

attributes.content: It's almost time.
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: Lada, Papa and Mama have to go now.
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: No... Waaaaaaaaaahhhh!!
attributes.name: Tender Girl

attributes.content: Don't go! Papa, Mama, don't leave me!
attributes.name: Tender Girl

attributes.content: Don't abandon me...
attributes.name: Tender Girl

attributes.content: So, I'm gonna go wherever I want to go! Nobody's gonna care anyway!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: That's the way things are!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: I, I see.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: (Is this girl... deliberately uncooperative? She's pretty worked up.)
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Well, I guess you can come with us for the time being. Given the current situation though, I'm not sure we can let a kid your age live alone.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: If there's no other place you want to go, then you can stay at Rhodes Island for now, just like that Sonya girl.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You mean, become an operator like Sonya? I've never thought about that before.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: It's not easy to become an operator.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: So once you're done packing, let's get going?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Mmkay!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Just gimme a little more time! I wanna bring that pan with me too!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: More stuff? Are you sure you can carry it all?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I guess that's goodbye to Chernobog.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The rendezvous point is just up ahead. Looks like we made it with some time to spare.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Thank you, Mister Pointedneedle! I couldn't fit all the kitchenware in my bag. Thank you so much for helping me out!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Don't worry, it's not a big deal. Besides, this wouldn't be the first time I carry water, or rather, a pan, for someone.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Err, don't worry about it, it's nothing... Hey, watch out!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Woah!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'm fine, I'm fine...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: ...Lada?
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Emperor above, it's really you!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: It's... Auntie Polina!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Someone you know?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Mhm! She's the nice auntie from next door who always looked after me!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Auntie Polina, I'm so glad you're safe!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: I was about to say the same, young lady!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Lada, you have no idea how much this means to me. We heard that the students were trapped inside the school, and after that, we searched everywhere for you. We were worried sick!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Where've you been all this time?
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: I was with my friends from the school. Rho-... Err, I mean, some nice people rescued us.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Nice people...? Do you mean that gentleman next to you?
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Hello, Madam Polina.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...Hello.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: (I've never seen this man before. What a strange look to him...)
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: (I say, Lada, are you sure the people who 'saved' you are trustworthy? You're not being tricked, are you?!)
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: (I'm not! Mister Pointedneedle is a great person!)
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: ...Ahem.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: R-Right! More importantly, how've you been, Auntie?
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Those bad guys didn't hurt your family, right? Are Uncle Zegna and Sister Clara fine?
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Yes, they're fine. Everyone's safe and sound.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: The police in our area responded quickly, and led us out to the wastes to hide until things settled down.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Zegna led a search party to look for you at the school, but when we didn't find anyone there, we had to leave.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: I'm just so glad that you're alive and well, Lada! His Majesty the Emperor truly smiles upon us!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: It's not like the Emperor did anything for us though. We only made it out because my friends and I looked out for each other.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Huh? Lada, what did you say just now?
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: ...Uhh, nothing!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Don't worry, Auntie Polina! I'm totally fine, because I'm super strong now!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: If bad guys ever try to bully us again, just tell me, and I'll help everyone drive the bad guys away!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Haha, our little Lada has already grown into such a reliable young woman!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Heh heh! I'll grow up to be even stronger and more reliable!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: When that time comes, I'll make sure none of those bad guys who wrecked the city get away! I'll smack 'em silly with my frying pan!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Are you talking about the frying pan I'm carrying on my back?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: That's the one!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: That's a pretty nice goal to have. Keep at it, kiddo.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Lada, there's not much time. We should go.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Ah, okay!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Okay, Auntie Polina, I have to go now...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Go? Wait, Lada, you didn't come to visit us? Wh-What do you mean you have to go?
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: I know we're only allowed to live in the asylum areas right now, but the conditions there aren't that bad. Soon enough, all these houses are going to get rebuilt.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Lada, isn't your home right here? Where are you going?
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: My home...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Auntie Polina... I'm really glad I could see you again. But, but!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: But, I want to be with my friends more than ever now... Anna, Sonya, and Natalya and Rosalind too. I don't want us to be separated.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: If I can't be with them... I don't know what I'll do. The thought is too scary...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Lada...
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: If you have nowhere to go, just go home. Let's go home, okay?
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: My house is ruined. Papa and Mama won't come back. I don't have a home anymore.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: But you don't have to worry about me. I'm going somewhere that's super safe!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: There are lots of people there, and they'll be real nice to me!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Isn't that right, Mister Pointedneedle?
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Yes. We will be able to guarantee her safety, at the very least.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: We would never expose a student of Lada's age to situations that are too dangerous.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Ooh... Sonya would be super mad if she heard you say that.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: She's already decided on becoming a full-fledged operator. I think she's even picked out her codename!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Forgive me then. I'd never dare say that to her face.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I suppose you've already made up your mind then. In that case, I won't ask too many questions. Just remember to write back often!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: As long as you're safe, then Uncle Zegna and I will feel at ease. Go out and see the world, but stay safe... And when our city is rebuilt, it's never too late to come back...
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Wait, Lada!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: I have something to give you! I've kept it with me, hoping I'd be able to give it to you one day.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: This is for you. Your parents gave it to our family for safekeeping a few years before they set off.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Huh? It belonged to Papa and Mama?
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: They said that if they couldn't make it back for your middle school graduation, to give it to you then.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: But you're leaving now, and I don't know when I'll be able to see you again. So, this is probably the best time to give it to you. You must cherish it.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: What's inside this box? Is this... a videotape?
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: And a photo... of the time I graduated from elementary school. With all our names written on it.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: This was supposed to be a gift to you, right?
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: I can't believe I still haven't heard a word from your parents even after such a major incident! Unbelievable, they still haven't written home in all these years!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: ––No, that's not it!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Papa and Mama... They're just, too busy with work...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Oh... If you can still believe that, then it's for the best.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Your parents... and their job. I heard it's not easy. It might even be harder than ours.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: When your grandmother was still with us, was always worried sick. She'd come around and chat with me, and well... 'Even if they were busy investigating something, how could they not spare the time to see family?'
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: In any case, promise me you'll take care of yourself, Lada. No matter where you go, remember to let me know how you're doing.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: I won't waste any more of your time then. Hurry along now.
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Papa, Mama...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Are you alright, Lada?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yes, I'm fine.
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Mister Pointedneedle, I... I think I might know what I want to do next!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Good girl, Lada. Don't cry.
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: Papa and Mama are doing work that is very important to Ursus, so we won't be able to stay with you often. We also won't be able to write back much...
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: But, we would never abandon you, Lada. You're Papa and Mama's precious baby.
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: But, but... the other kids said...
attributes.name: Tender Girl

attributes.content: They said nobody wants me...
attributes.name: Tender Girl

attributes.content: How could that be? Papa and Mama love you very much. Those kids just don't know better.
attributes.name: Warm Woman

attributes.content: We might be apart for a while. We might not be able to see each other, or even talk to each other. When we miss each other, maybe the only thing that will keep us going is a little memory.
attributes.name: Warm Woman

attributes.content: It's our fault that we won't be able to watch you grow up, but always remember... Lada, Papa and Mama will always love you.
attributes.name: Warm Woman

attributes.content: No matter where we are, no matter what path you choose in the future...
attributes.name: Warm Woman

attributes.content: We will always support you.
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: And whenever we get the chance, we'll definitely come back to be with you.
attributes.name: Calm Man

attributes.content: When I was little, the other kids would always make fun of me for being an orphan. A parentless street kid.
I felt terrible. I'd cry and tell my parents on the rare occasions they came home.
Not long after that, for some unknown reason, the kids stopped making fun of me. And they never did again. The big girl next door would gently pat my head, and say to me:
'I'm so sorry about before. Your parents are amazing researchers.'
My Papa and Mama are amazing.
But I rarely get to see them.
On the day I graduated from elementary school, Papa and Mama came back.
We went to the graduation ceremony together. We took pictures together, and went out to all kinds of fun places.
Papa and Mama said they didn't want to miss me growing up. So no matter how tough things were, they'd try to be with me on my most important days.
Papa and Mama said they wanted me to know more about their lives, so they recorded them and passed them down to me so that I'd have more company whenever I missed them.
Does that mean as long as I keep growing up, I'll be able to see Papa and Mama again?
Hum hum~ Hum dee dum~
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Istina, did you take the picture? You did, right? I finally passed the test!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Hold on, Lada, slow down a little...
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Phew... Alright, there you go. By the way, why'd you suddenly decide to start chronicling your life?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hmm... I guess, to record a bit more of my growth. It's a secret surprise!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Oh right, Istina! Since I passed my test, I'm now an official operator, just like you and the others! Remember to call me by my codename now!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Gummy! My codename is Gummy!
attributes.name: Lada

attributes.content: Okay, Gummy.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: That's going to take some time to get used to. You could always refer to yourself in the third person, in the meantime.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Oh, right! Good idea!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Gummy's gonna work super hard to protect my friends, and everyone else at Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Good morning, Lada, Anna.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Morning.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Mister Pointedneedle! Good morning!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: You can't call me Lada anymore! I'm a full-fledged operator now, so call me Gummy!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Haha, well done. Congratulations.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh, Mister Pointedneedle, Gummy had a question for you!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Hm? If you need help with something, feel free to ask away.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Does Rhodes Island... have a school? Can Gummy keep studying?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Where is this coming from?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I'm afraid we don't have anything like a formal school, but we do have training courses and general education courses.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Really? Does that mean I can continue studying then?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Of course. With that proactive attitude, any teacher would be delighted to have you in class.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Actually, even if you didn't bring it up, I assume there would be a dedicated operator who'd let you know.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The Doctor specifically checked in on you girls to make sure you could continue your education. You might not even be able to get away if you wanted to!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...Zima's head is going to pop right off.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Haha, she's not gonna make it easy for the teacher though.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Papa, Mama... I live in a place called Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Even though... Even though there are a lot of things I don't understand here, and some things that are scary to think about...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: As long as I'm with my friends, I know I'm going to be alright!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Papa, Mama, make sure you work hard too. I'm going to write to Auntie Polina and tell them how to reach Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: If you want to write back, or come to visit, Auntie Polina will tell you where I am, and then we can meet up at Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Besides, I'm really mad that you left me alone for so long, and weren't there for me during the scariest part of my life!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Because I'm really, really mad, I might not be able to forgive the two of you. So when we meet, we might fight a lot!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: But... Well, no matter how much we fight, we'll still be family, right?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: If Papa and Mama are too busy and can't find the time... Then I'll find you myself!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: But, I can't do that yet. I've already changed a whole lot, and that might be scary to you...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I'll get over those... Those not-so-good habits of mine!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: There are lots of people here who will help me get over them. Anna and the other girls... We'll put those nasty things behind us, and we'll all be happy!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: So wait for me...
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I'm going to grow up to be the best that I can be!
attributes.name: Gummy
